description: brgen(BinaRy encoder/decoder GENerator driver) cmptest utility configuration schema

inputs.description: List of input files to be used for testing

binary.description: binary data file to be used for testing

file_base.description: base name of test target file

failure_case.description: flag to indicate that the test input binary of this file is failure case

hex_input.description: flag to indicate that the test input is hex string

file.description: file name of runner configuration that contains an JSON object with below properties

replace_struct_name.description: struct name to be replaced in test runner template

replace_file_name.description: file name to be replaced in test runner template

build_input_name.description: input file name to be used for building test runner

build_output_name.description: output file name to be generated by building test runner

build_command.description: command to build test runner. $INPUT and $OUTPUT will be replaced with build_input_name and build_output_name

run_command.description: command to run test runner.$EXEC is replaced with built executable (or script) by build_command and $INPUT and $OUTPUT will be replaced with input binary and output binary path
